item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Peter Izsak
item.description: Hello there! I’m Peter, a software enthusiast, code tinkerer, researcher and avid technologist. I’m a Research Scientist working in the intersection of Deep Learning and Natural Language Processing at Intel Labs. When offline and not coding I’m either traveling, cooking or spending quality time with my family!
